title: Enhancing Practical Software Development Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Workplace Social Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social domain knowledge (e.g., organizational management, basic communication concepts)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can proactively conduct learning activities using three or more digital tools (surveys, discussion boards, quiz apps) in blended learning environments
Learners apply social job theories acquired from offline workshops to online case analysis activities at over 80% to solve practical problems
Learners can periodically review learning content through mobile-based formative assessments and achieve a mastery rate of over 70%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
